text: 1.19: Ais 29.14; Jer 8.9Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap vhɨra khaŋ nzuai, “Gu mba ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ki gumgi, gu mbe ndɨkndɨgir vhuuin muuŋgirim, mbe nduarira nta ganɨnga, nta fhura ki ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ ma. Gu vhɨra mba bigi kaŋgi gumgi, gu mbe ndɨkndɨgir muuŋgirim, nta bigɨn then muuŋgirga, tuktɨgi fhuvara.”
